title: Samsung launches new rugged T7 Shield Portable SSD with IP65 dust and water protection
content:
Samsung continues to diversify its venerable T-series line of SSDs and today is launching its new T7 Shield portable SSD with a rugged rubberized exterior and substantial dust and water protection. The T7 Shield isn’t much larger or heavier than or security-focused T7 Touch, but it brings the added protection from the elements that some active users may require.

more…

The post Samsung launches new rugged T7 Shield Portable SSD with IP65 dust and water protection appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Samsung T7 Shield first impressions. Samsung adds a layer of protection to its popular T-Series portable SSDs.
